name: indecently
content:
indecently adverb
(IMMORAL)
Add to word list
Add to word list
in a way that is morally offensive and relates to sex: indecently assaulted A student was indecently assaulted at a railway station. He was wearing indecently short shorts.
More examplesFewer examplesThey behaved indecently in a public place. He is accused of indecently assaulting four women. He was wearing an indecently tight white jumpsuit.
